title: Did Comedian Steve Harvey Praise President Trump as a Politically Incorrect ‘Fixer’?
subtitle: Facebook users attributed an unusual analogy about "raccoons" to "Steve Harvey" in early 2019. But which Steve Harvey?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The comedian and broadcaster Steve Harvey once praised Donald Trump as a flawed but effective president hired to "get rid of" the Democratic and Republican parties, as well as undocumented immigrants.
